testcase.name: usePhraseCycler > should initialize with the first witty phrase when not active and not waiting
usePhraseCycler > should show "Waiting for user confirmation..." when isWaiting is true
usePhraseCycler > should not cycle phrases if isActive is false and not waiting
usePhraseCycler > should cycle through witty phrases when isActive is true and not waiting
usePhraseCycler > should reset to a witty phrase when isActive becomes true after being false (and not waiting)
usePhraseCycler > should clear phrase interval on unmount when active
usePhraseCycler > should reset to a witty phrase when transitioning from waiting to active
